snippet.title: Lost Ruins [PC] Kickstarter Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost Ruins is a dark, 2D side-scrolling metroidvania, where you play as a young girl who has awoken in a strange, dimly lit dungeon without any of her memories.

More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/14256/

Support the kickstarter campaign: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/altarigames/lost-ruins

#LostRuins  #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
